properties.description: Pipeline to extract data into CT_BUSN_LOC_D_STG table in AAACCEL schema.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
/*CT_BUSN_LOC_D_STG*/
SELECT 
	TO_CHAR(HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID) AS BUSN_LOC_ID,
	NULL AS SET_ID,
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.NAME AS BUSN_LOC_NAME,
	MTL_PARAMETERS.ORGANIZATION_CODE AS BUSN_LOC_NUM,
	'Plant' AS BUSN_LOC_TYPE,
	'MAIN' AS ADDRESS_TYPE,
	(SELECT FULL_NAME   FROM PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F WHERE    PERSON_ID=HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.DESIGNATED_RECEIVER_ID   
	AND SYSDATE BETWEEN       EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL(EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,SYSDATE) )                                   
	AS CONTACT_NAME,
	(SELECT EMPLOYEE_NUMBER   FROM PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F WHERE    PERSON_ID=HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.DESIGNATED_RECEIVER_ID   
	AND SYSDATE BETWEEN       EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL(EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,SYSDATE))     AS CONTACT_NUM,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NAME,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NUM,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_1 AS ST_ADDRESS1, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_2 AS ST_ADDRESS2, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_3 AS ST_ADDRESS3, 
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS4, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TOWN_OR_CITY   AS CITY_NAME,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.POSTAL_CODE    AS POSTAL_CODE, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2               AS STATE_REGION,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.COUNTRY AS COUNTRY_CODE, 
	COUNTRY.TERRITORY_SHORT_NAME  AS COUNTRY_NAME,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_1                         AS COUNTRY_REGION,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_1 AS PHONE_NUM, 
	NVL(HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_2, '-') AS FAX_NUM,
	'-'     AS WEB_ADDRESS ,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2 AS STATE_CODE,
	STATE.TERRITORY_SHORT_NAME AS STATE_NAME,
	'-' AS EMAIL_ADDRESS,
	(CASE WHEN TRUNC(HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.INACTIVE_DATE)>TRUNC(SYSDATE) then 'ACTIVE' else 'INACTIVE' END) AS ACTIVE_STATUS, 
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.DATE_FROM AS EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT,
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.DATE_TO AS EFFECTIVE_TO_DT,
	NULL AS LOCATION_DETAILS_ID,
	MTL_PARAMETERS.CREATION_DATE AS CREATION_DT,
	MTL_PARAMETERS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS LAST_UPDATE_DT,
	MTL_PARAMETERS.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY,
	MTL_PARAMETERS.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS LAST_UPDATED_BY,
	'Plant~'||TO_CHAR(HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID) AS INTEGRATION_ID,
	1000 AS DATASOURCE_NUM_ID,
	'Y' ACTIVE_FLAG,
	'N' DELETE_FLAG
FROM 
	MTL_PARAMETERS,
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL,
	FND_TERRITORIES_TL  COUNTRY,
	FND_TERRITORIES_TL STATE  
WHERE 
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID = MTL_PARAMETERS.ORGANIZATION_ID
	AND HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.LOCATION_ID = HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.LOCATION_ID
	AND HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.COUNTRY = COUNTRY.TERRITORY_CODE (+)
	AND HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2 = STATE.TERRITORY_CODE (+)
	AND COUNTRY.LANGUAGE(+) = 'US'
	AND STATE.LANGUAGE(+) = 'US'
	--AND TO_CHAR(MTL_PARAMETERS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= '2022-01-01'

UNION

SELECT 
	TO_CHAR(HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID) AS BUSN_LOC_ID,
	NULL AS SET_ID,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.DESCRIPTION AS BUSN_LOC_NAME,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME AS BUSN_LOC_NUM,
	'STORAGE_LOC' AS BUSN_LOC_TYPE,
	'MAIN' AS ADDRESS_TYPE,
	(SELECT FULL_NAME   FROM PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F WHERE    PERSON_ID=HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.DESIGNATED_RECEIVER_ID   
	AND SYSDATE BETWEEN       EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL(EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,SYSDATE) )                                   
	AS CONTACT_NAME,
	(SELECT EMPLOYEE_NUMBER   FROM PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F WHERE    PERSON_ID=HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.DESIGNATED_RECEIVER_ID   
	AND SYSDATE BETWEEN       EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL(EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,SYSDATE) )  AS CONTACT_NUM,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NAME,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NUM,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_1 AS ST_ADDRESS1, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_2 AS ST_ADDRESS2, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.ADDRESS_LINE_3 AS ST_ADDRESS3, 
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS4, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TOWN_OR_CITY   AS CITY_NAME,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.POSTAL_CODE    AS POSTAL_CODE, 
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2               AS STATE_REGION,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.COUNTRY AS COUNTRY_CODE, 
	COUNTRY.TERRITORY_SHORT_NAME  AS COUNTRY_NAME,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_1                         AS COUNTRY_REGION,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_1 AS PHONE_NUM, 
	NVL(HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_2, '-') AS FAX_NUM,
	'-'     AS WEB_ADDRESS ,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2 AS STATE_CODE,
	STATE.TERRITORY_SHORT_NAME AS STATE_NAME,
	'-' AS EMAIL_ADDRESS,
	(CASE WHEN TRUNC(HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.INACTIVE_DATE)>TRUNC(SYSDATE) then 'ACTIVE' else 'INACTIVE' END) AS ACTIVE_STATUS, 
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.DATE_FROM AS EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT,
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.DATE_TO AS EFFECTIVE_TO_DT,
	NULL AS LOCATION_DETAILS_ID,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.CREATION_DATE AS CREATION_DT,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS LAST_UPDATE_DT,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY,
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS LAST_UPDATED_BY,
	'STORAGE_LOC~'||TO_CHAR(HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID)||'~'||MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME AS INTEGRATION_ID,
	1000 AS DATASOURCE_NUM_ID,
	'Y' ACTIVE_FLAG,
	'N' DELETE_FLAG
FROM  
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES,
	HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL,
	FND_TERRITORIES_TL COUNTRY,
	FND_TERRITORIES_TL STATE
WHERE 
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.ORGANIZATION_ID = HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.ORGANIZATION_ID
	AND HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS.LOCATION_ID = HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.LOCATION_ID
	AND HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.COUNTRY = COUNTRY.TERRITORY_CODE (+)
	AND HR_LOCATIONS_ALL.REGION_2 = STATE.TERRITORY_CODE (+)
	AND COUNTRY.LANGUAGE(+) = 'US'
	AND STATE.LANGUAGE(+) = 'US'
	--AND TO_CHAR(MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= '2022-01-01'

UNION

SELECT 
	TO_CHAR(MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.INVENTORY_LOCATION_ID) BUSN_LOC_ID,
	NULL AS SET_ID,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS BUSN_LOC_NAME,
	TO_CHAR(MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.INVENTORY_LOCATION_ID) AS BUSN_LOC_NUM,
	'INV_LOC' AS BUSN_LOC_TYPE,
	'MAIN' AS ADDRESS_TYPE,
	'-' AS CONTACT_NAME,
	'-' AS CONTACT_NUM,
	'-' AS PARENT_LOC_NAME,
	'-' AS PARENT_LOC_NUM,
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS1,
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS2,
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS3,
	'-' AS ST_ADDRESS4,
	'-' AS CITY_NAME,
	'-' AS POSTAL_CODE,
	'-' AS STATE_REGION,
	'-' AS COUNTRY_CODE,
	'-' AS COUNTRY_NAME,
	'-' AS COUNTRY_REGION,
	'-' AS PHONE_NUM,
	'-' AS FAX_NUM,
	'-' AS WEB_ADDRESS,
	'-' AS STATE_CODE,
	'-' AS STATE_NAME,
	'-' AS EMAIL_ADDRESS,
	'Y' AS ACTIVE_STATUS,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.START_DATE_ACTIVE AS EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.END_DATE_ACTIVE AS EFFECTIVE_TO_DT,
	NULL AS LOCATION_DETAILS_ID,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.CREATION_DATE AS CREATION_DT,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS LAST_UPDATE_DT,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY,
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS LAST_UPDATED_BY,
	'INV_LOC~'||TO_CHAR(MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.INVENTORY_LOCATION_ID) INTEGRATION_ID,
	1000 AS DATASOURCE_NUM_ID,
	'Y' ACTIVE_FLAG,
	'N' DELETE_FLAG
FROM 
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS_KFV MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS, 
	MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES 
WHERE 
	MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.ORGANIZATION_ID = MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.ORGANIZATION_ID 
	AND MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.SUBINVENTORY_CODE = MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME
	--AND TO_CHAR(MTL_ITEM_LOCATIONS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= '2022-01-01'

UNION

SELECT
	TO_CHAR(LOC.LOCATION_ID) AS BUSN_LOC_ID,
	NULL                     AS SET_ID,
	LOT.DESCRIPTION           AS BUSN_LOC_NAME,
	TO_CHAR(LOC.LOCATION_ID) AS BUSN_LOC_NUM,
	'EMP_LOC' AS BUSN_LOC_TYPE,
	'-'      AS ADDRESS_TYPE,
	'-'                                                        AS CONTACT_NAME,
	'-'                                                        AS CONTACT_NUM,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NAME,
	'-'                                                       AS PARENT_LOC_NUM,
	LOC.ADDRESS_LINE_1         AS ST_ADDRESS1,
	LOC.ADDRESS_LINE_2         AS ST_ADDRESS2,
	LOC.ADDRESS_LINE_3         AS ST_ADDRESS3,
	'-'                        AS ST_ADDRESS4,
	LOC.TOWN_OR_CITY           AS CITY_NAME,
	LOC.POSTAL_CODE            AS POSTAL_CODE,
	'-'               AS STATE_REGION,
	LOC.COUNTRY                AS COUNTRY_CODE,
	TER.TERRITORY_SHORT_NAME    AS COUNTRY_NAME,
	'-'                        AS COUNTRY_REGION,
	LOC.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_1      AS PHONE_NUM,
	NVL(LOC.TELEPHONE_NUMBER_2, '-') AS FAX_NUM,
	'-'      AS WEB_ADDRESS ,
	LOC.REGION_2               AS STATE_CODE,
	LOC.REGION_1               AS STATE_NAME,
	'-'           AS EMAIL_ADDRESS,
	'-'        AS ACTIVE_STATUS,
	NULL AS EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT,
	NULL AS EFFECTIVE_TO_DT,
	NULL AS LOCATION_DETAILS_ID,
	LOC.CREATION_DATE  AS CREATION_DT,
	LOC.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS LAST_UPDATE_DT,
	LOC.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY,
	LOC.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS LAST_UPDATED_BY,
	TO_CHAR(LOC.LOCATION_ID) AS INTEGRATION_ID,
	1000 AS DATASOURCE_NUM_ID,
	'Y' ACTIVE_FLAG,
	'N' DELETE_FLAG
FROM
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL      LOC,
	HR_LOCATIONS_ALL_TL   LOT,
	FND_TERRITORIES_TL TER
WHERE   1=1
	AND LOC.LOCATION_ID = LOT.LOCATION_ID
	AND LOT.LANGUAGE = 'US'
	AND LOC.COUNTRY = TER.TERRITORY_CODE (+)
	AND TER.LANGUAGE(+) = 'US'
	--AND TO_CHAR(LOC.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= '2022-01-01'
;

folder.name: Raja Puranam - DEV/Anchor Packaging V1 - Dont Touch/Source to Stage/CD
